alert.note: Alert for Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 7:11PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Florence, north central Georgetown, south central Marion and Williamsburg Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 711 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Morrisville, or 10 miles southeast of Kingstree, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Kingstree, Johnsonville, Hemingway, Salters, Hannah, Cades, Poston, Nesmith, Indiantown, Outland, Hebron, Friendfield, Morrisville, Henry, Kingsburg, Scranton, Greeleyville, Stuckey and Lake City Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
